title: US migrant caravan: Trump's asylum ban halted by judge
description: A US federal judge temporarily blocks an order by President Trump to deny asylum to illegal immigrants.
content: Media caption Trump and the facts about the migrant caravan A US federal judge has blocked an order issued by President Trump to deny asylum to migrants crossing the southern US border illegally. US District Judge Jon Tigar in San Francisco issued the temporaâ€¦ [+319 chars]
